Genasys Emergency Notification System
=====================================

![Genasys QR Code City of Livingston Texas](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1309 "Genasys QR Code City of Livingston Texas")

![01_GEN_MasterLogos_RGB_050423_Horizontal_Black](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1297 "01_GEN_MasterLogos_RGB_050423_Horizontal_Black")

Genasys Emergency Notification System
-------------------------------------

The City has subscribed to the Genasys Protect Alert Emergency Notification System.  This system allows authorized City leaders, Police Department and Emergency personnel to rapidly alert citizens and subscribers to any situation affecting the safety and welfare of the City including:

* Crime Alerts
* Emergency Alerts
* Hazardous Traffic Conditions
* Other Matters of Community Interest
* Severe Weather Warnings

Subscribers may be notified by messages distributed by telephone voice, text message, and/or email message.

Registration
------------

Subscription to the Genasys system is not automatic.  It is our desire that every residence and business in our community be included in the notification database. You should register online for the Genasys system by going to the City of Livingston [Genasys Portal.](https://livingston.genasys.com/portal/en/register) You should have available your name, street address, telephone numbers and email address and be prepared to create a password. If you reside within the Livingston City limits, you should indicate your physical location on the mapping option, as some notification alerts may only affect a portion of the City.

You may change your notification information anytime by signing in to your account at the City's [Genasys portal](https://livingston.genasys.com/portal/en/register) and changing your notification information.

**Create a Genasys Contact in Your Mobile Device**
--------------------------------------------------

Phone Number:  936-444-4886     Text:  65513     Email:  [noreply@genasys.com](mailto:noreply@genasys.com)
